author: Odeinoichus
title: And the Gold Goes to!
review:
Set #71027 Athlete: Such a generic term for such a welcome Minifigure. This little gem of a character includes a white spear for a javelin, a printed disk to represent the Discus and some great parts. She includes dual-molded legs with printing on the sides of her feet for shoe markings, possible a Nike equivalent in the LEGO universe. Octan Sneakers maybe?

Her torso includes 0937 on the back and front representing her number in the event, she also has two gold medals, a smiling expression after winning and a determined sweaty expression of exertion as she participates in her events.

Overall she's great, but her name could have used some work. Track & Field Star might have been a better idea than simply the generic term Athlete. Highly Recommended.
